    • @@ -355,0 +356,1 @@ + * @see ToggleState @@ -357,1 +359,1 @@ - TOGGLE_STATE(Integer.class), + TOGGLE_STATE(ToggleState.class), @@ -822,0 +824,23 @@ + + /** + * This enum describes the values for TOGGLE_STATE attribute. + * + * @see TOGGLE_STATE + * @since 21 + */ + public enum ToggleState { + /** + * Indicates that the toggle control is not selected. + */ + UNCHECKED, + + /** + * Indicates that the toggle control is selected. + */ + CHECKED, + + /** + * Indicates that the toggle state of the control cannot be determined. + */ + INDETERMINATE + }
